name: TurkeyTimer
0:
”Alexa, ask Turkey Timer how long should I thaw this turkey”
”Alexa, ask Turkey Timer how long should a ten pound turkey thaw”
”Alexa, ask Turkey Timer how long does a twenty pound turkey need to thaw”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: turkey timer
des:
You can ask the turkey timer how many hours or days you need to thaw a frozen turkey before it can be roasted! 
The calculation is based upon the suggested thawing time of six hours per pound.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
